definition: to congratulate beforehand/to offer best wishes for
to wish/to express good wishes/to pray/(old) wizard

sentences.english: So here's to the impending revolution in biology. Come Darwin's 300th anniversary there will be even more to celebrate.
sentences.chinese: 所以，我们预祝即将来临的生物学革命。当达尔文诞生

sentences.english: We wish Nantong Zhanyang Fiber Co. , Ltd a promising future on the land of Haimen.
sentences.chinese: 我们预祝展阳公司在海门大地上展现阳光灿烂的前景。

sentences.english: Hereby, I'd like to wish this Sino-EU Economic Forum a complete success.
sentences.chinese: 在此，我预祝中欧经济论坛取得圆满成功。

sentences.english: At last, I wish a complete success for the UCEA and CCEA Continuing Education Forum.
sentences.chinese: 最后，我预祝本次论坛取得圆满成功。

sentences.english: I wish all the athletes the best of luck in their competitions.
sentences.chinese: 我预祝各参赛健儿在运动会能够取得佳绩。

sentences.english: We congratulate you beforehand on your success.
John crossed his fingers during the race so that Bill would win.
sentences.chinese: 比尔在赛跑时，约翰叉起两指预祝他获胜。

sentences.english: First I'd like to wish King World Hotel a more successful new year.
sentences.chinese: 首先预祝君豪大饭店在新的一年里更上一层楼。

sentences.english: Wish all colleagues a pleasant holiday and a happy family in advance.
sentences.chinese: 预祝全体同事节日愉快，合家欢乐。

sentences.english: The Governor General welcomed Ambassador Zhang as the new Chinese Ambassador to Canada and wished him all the best in his tenure.
sentences.chinese: 约翰斯顿总督欢迎章大使履新，预祝他任内工作顺利。

sentences.english: I wish the conference a full success.
sentences.chinese: 我预祝会议取得圆满成功。

sentences.english: I wish this forum a complete success.
sentences.chinese: 我预祝本次会议圆满成功。

definition: to wish/to express good wishes/to pray/(old) wizard
lit. to win a victory on raising the flag (idiom); fig. to start on sth and have immediate success/success in a single move
to congratulate respectfully/to wish good luck and success (esp. to a superior)/with best wishes (in writing)
to have one's wishes come true/wish you the best!
to have all one's wishes (idiom)/best wishes/all the best/may all your hopes be fulfilled
to continue the struggle (idiom); to persist/unremitting efforts
to have a pleasant journey/Bon voyage!
